name: gcode-viewer
description: A simple gcode viewer lib using three.js
author: aligator <me@aligator.dev>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production && yarn clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist-esm && webpack
scripts.build:dev: yarn clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist-esm && webpack
scripts.prepublish: yarn format && yarn build && yarn test
scripts.postpublish: sed -i "s|https://unpkg.com/gcode-viewer@[0-9]*\.[0-9]*\.[0-9]*|https://unpkg.com/gcode-viewer@$(jq -r .version package.json)|g" example/*.html && git add example/*.html
